short-description:
Salut! Mon nom est Antonin Langlade.
J'ai 23 ans et je suis développeur chez DanParis, TBWA France.
long-description: I use to develop with JS (Frameworks with Backbone, Require.js, Grunt, Sass, etc) and Objective C (currently in Swift learning). First of all I am a designer before a developer. At Gobelins, we learn to build a project : starting with the idea and going until the end of the digital production. This is what we call the design process and that’s why I’m a designer.
some-work: Voici quelques uns de mes derniers travaux
